text:
#GoHomeGota 

Dayan J once again exhibits his views on the “place” of Tamils in 🇱🇰 society, i.e. not equal citizens but ppl to be tolerated & to whom the South/Sinhalese can give or deny rights. He’s peddling racism while denying it is one of the root causes of ethnic conflict. https://t.co/ADy2pZz71a
